job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Our SolutionpDemyst unlocks innovation with the power of data Our platform helps enterprises solve strategic use cases including lending risk digital origination and automation by harnessing the power and agility of the external data universe We are known for harnessing rich relevant integrated linked data to deliver real value in production We operate as a distributed team in the US and Asia and serve over 50 clients globally as a strategic external data partner Frictionless external data adoption within tech forward enterprises is unlocking market growth and allowing solutions to finally get out of the lab If you like to actually get things done and deployed versus never ending exploration Demyst is your new homebrbrpbrpbrbrbrpThe OpportunitypAs a Data Scientist at Demyst you will be powering the latest technology from leading financial institutions around the world Using innovative data sets and Demysts software architecture you will use your expertise and creativity to build bestinclass solutions You will see projects through from start to finish assisting in every stage from testing to integration This is a remote position working with Engineers across the globe US Austria Singapore Australia You will report to the Director of the Data Service TeambrbrpbrpstrongThis role is fully remotebrbrstrongpbrpbrbrbrpResponsibilitiesul liCollaborating with project management and sales teams to solve clients business and technical problemsli liPerforming data appends extracts and analysis to deliver curated data to clientsli liUnderstanding wide arrays of data provider landscapes including consumer business property and digital datali liOpportunities to work on entity detection record linking and NLP projects will also be availableli liTransforming onetime projects into repeatable code for productionli liRolling out changes to production use cases in close coordination with clients IT teamsli liOther tasks as necessaryli brulpRequirementsbrbrppbrbrbrpbrul liComputer Science or Data Science degree or commensurate work experience Masters degree preferredli li13 years of Python programming with Pandas experienceli liExperience with CSV JSON parquet Avro and other common formatsli liData cleaning and structuring ETL experienceli liKnowledge of API REST and SOAP HTTP protocols API Security and best practicesli liExperience with SQLli liExperience with Gitli liInterest or experience in machine learning and data modelingli brulpBenefitsbrbrpul liGenerous benefits amp competitive compensationli liBe a part of the exploding external data ecosystemli liJoin an established fast growth data technology businessli liCollaborative inclusive work cultureli ulbrpemDemystData is committed to creating a diverse rewarding career environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer We strongly encourage individuals from all walks of life to applybrbremp
